articles.title: How to watch Nvidia GTC 2025, including CEO Jensen Huang’s keynote - TechCrunch
articles.description: Here's how to watch Nvidia's biggest event of the year, GTC. GTC 2025 is returning to San Jose, California from March 17 to March 21.
articles.content: GTC, Nvidia’s biggest conference of the year, returns this week, with the biggest announcements probably coming Tuesday. If you can’t make it in person, don’t sweat it. TechCrunch will be on the grou… [+1246 chars]

articles.title: Google brings a ‘canvas’ feature to Gemini, plus Audio Overview - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is bringing a new 'canvas' feature to Gemini, the company announced, plus the Audio Overview feature from NotebookLM.
articles.content:
They say imitation is the sincerest form of flattery, and Google seems to agree.
